LanguageData.Infestation.letterTest: A bug hive has emerged!\n\nIt will slowly spawn bugs as well as produce additional hives. If you don't want it to infest the whole area, muster your forces and destroy it. But beware - the bugs will defend their hive.
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorShipPartCrash.letterText:
大きな古代の船のパーツが近くに衝突しました。

入植者達は、いいようのない不安を口々にしています。それは船に搭載された、サイキック照射能力を持ったAIによるものに違いありません。

できる限り速やかに破壊しなければなりません。
LanguageData.PoisonShipPartCrash.letterText:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

It is leaking toxic material and will kill all plants in an expanding circle around itself.

Destroy it as soon as possible.
